title: Anyone skip specific chapters in a novel that feature certain characters?
body:
I LOVE the Wheel of Time. I love Michael Kramer. But I fucking hate listening to the chapters involving a great deal of the female characters.

They're pretty much all dumb and wrong about just every damn thing. I was fine the first read through (as the story may be important) But when I listen to it for entertainment I just skip entire sections of the book because I cannot be bothered to listen to their prattle.
